snippet: At least nine children died in a fire in Dakar, including seven boys who beg and study the Koran under the guidance of a holy man.
abstract: House fire in Dakar, Senegal, kills at least nine children, seven of whom were Koranic students entrusted to study Koran under holy man in evenings and beg for him by day.
lead_paragraph: At least nine children died in a fire in Dakar, including seven boys who beg and study the Koran under the guidance of a holy man.

headline.seo: Fire in Senegal Kills Child Beggars Trapped in House

headline.print_headline: Fire in Senegal Kills Child Beggars Trapped in House
